title: White Stone Bracelet
description: Our White Stone Bracelets are handmade to ensure quality. Will it fit? Yes, the bracelets can be stretched so there's no concern of fitment.

title: Contemporary Marble Cuff
description: Designed with tastefulness in mind, our Marble Button Cuff will make an elegant addition to your jewelry collection.

title: Trilayer Adjustable Cuff
description: Style at an affordable price. This cuff has a clean, tasteful design, making it a must-have for formal or business casual outfits.

title: Interwoven Bangle
description: Our Interwoven Bangle is best suited as an elegant piece for a formal setting.

title: Geometric Bangle
description: Our Geometric Bangle is best suited with a business casual outfit.

title: Bohemian Open Cuff
description: Our elegant Bohemian Open Cuff is sure to draw attention and compliments. This cuff adjusts to comfortably fit your wrists.

title: Marble Pattern Bangle
description: The Marble Pattern Bangle elegantly dresses up your wrists. Suitable for any social setting.
